body_html:
Changed the phrase to

[...]weights are initialized using the default initializer used by tf.get_variable

I think this might be the best solution in the long run; i.e., if the default initializer in tf.get_variable gets changed for some reason in future, we don't have to remember to update the documentation here as well.

[...]weights are initialized using the default initializer used by tf.get_variable

I think this might be the best solution in the long run; i.e., if the default initializer in tf.get_variable gets changed for some reason in future, we don't have to remember to update the documentation here as well.
body:
Changed the phrase to 

> [...]weights are initialized using the default initializer used by `tf.get_variable` 

I think this might be the best solution in the long run; i.e., if the default initializer in `tf.get_variable` gets changed for some reason in future, we don't have to remember to update the documentation here as well.
